group_1.textLeft: ...Um, my hobby is what he began meddling with.
...Because I come from a samurai lineage,@grandfather would tell me war stories.
The people around the JSDF base had an impact@on me...so...
I liked military things...
And from there I grew to like things like@steampunk...

group_1.textRight: Sure.

group_1.textLeft: ...Sure?!
You don't find it childish or funny?

group_1.textRight: No, because I've already seen your Magical Girl@outfit... And know about your hunting...
So a hobby like that fits the Asahi-chan image.
Or rather, I don't think it's childish at all, okay?
If anything I'd say it looks more like an adult hobby.

group_1.textLeft: Is...that right?

group_1.textRight: I agree with her.
I am the same, um... I like cute things...
So having said that, my hobby may be much more@childish...
Ah, so that gun looking thing that was in your@room earlier,
it was related to your military hobby?

group_1.textLeft: You saw it, did you...@...Well, that it is.

group_1.textRight: So that's why there was that knife sharpening@noise...!

group_1.textLeft: That I use for hunting.@It's a survival knife, you see...

group_1.textRight: You didn't want us to see that you have a hobby@like this, so you set up all those traps!
And the reason your room was empty was because@you put everything away?!

group_1.textLeft: Well, I did do that...

group_1.textRight: I was curious about so much, but the whole puzzle's@been solved!
Ah, hey hey! Next time I want to see more of@your stuff!
I would like to accompany you as well!@If that's okay with Asahi-san, that is...

group_1.textLeft: As long as push doesn't come to shove, I don't mind@showing a little...

group_1.textRight: Ahâ€•... I was being blunt with you again, sorry.
But I will never push you to!
Because I'm happy just to learn more about you,@Asahi-chan!

group_1.textLeft: ...Is that so?

group_1.textRight: ...By the way, this milly tarry and steemu ponk...@what are those?

group_1.textLeft: ...Is that where you're left at?

group_1.textRight: I don't really get it all myself, but I'm guessin'@they're similar enough, ain't they?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:103401:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]They are completely different...!
First of all, the word military means...

group_1.textRight: Oh!@A shooting star...!

group_1.textLeft: Hold on, I do not want you changing the subject...!

group_1.textRight: Ah, but there really are shooting stars!

group_1.textLeft: This must be the peak time.

group_1.textRight: What do I do, what do I do, I gotta hurry and make@a wish!
Umm, umm...[chara:102601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102601:motion_000][chara:102601:cheek_0][chara:102601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102601:lipSynch_1]that's it!

group_1.narration: "Even when we're all grannies,@may we all continue to be friends just like this!"

group_1.textRight: Come on come on, hurry you guys!

group_1.textLeft: Then... Peace and harmony in our everyday lives,@I suppose...?
Ryouko-chan, what did you wish for this time?

group_1.textRight: Mm?@Gimme a minute.
It would be nice if I could live with my parents in@nature again...

group_1.textLeft: What do I wish for...@Prosperity for the Tokime Clan...or something?

group_1.textRight: That is the head family's wish, is it not?@What about yourself, Shizuka?

group_1.textLeft: ...Hmm, I'm not really sure,
but I would like a future where everyone is happy@and equal.

group_1.textRight: And Asahi-chan?

group_1.textLeft: Me...you ask?
...Let's see.
(Our wishes will never come true.)
(Becoming grandmas...a future of peace, none of it.)
(The only thing awaiting us is destruction...)
(But...even so, if by chance it could come true...)
To stay together with everyone quietly now and@long into the future...
If it could be, it would certainly be delightful.

group_1.textRight: Yeahâ€•! It so would, Asahi-chan!

group_1.textLeft: Huhu.

group_1.textRight: What is it, Shizuka?

group_1.textLeft: It feels like we have all become a little closer again.
To be honest, I wasn't sure about Asahi at first.
Even now that still hasn't changed,
but even so, we are becoming her friends little@by little.
...That's all I was thinking.

group_1.textRight: ...Hey, Asahi.
I wonder, will you walk the path together with us@from now on, as Tokime Clan?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.0][chara:103401:motion_100][chara:103401:cheek_0][chara:103401:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:103401:lipSynch_1]Of course I will.
(Until the day comes where we must part ways,
I will do everything I can here.)
(...Truthfully, it is unnecessary to support them@this much.)
(Even so...)

group_1.textRight: Thank you, Asahi!

group_1.textLeft: (They laugh so innocently that I don't want to see@them unhappy.)

group_1.narration: Even if we all go to the same place...
I want them to live a little longer.@I want them to be able to just laugh.@Yes, that is how I feel.
So...even though I know it will never come true,@even if I am led to despair greater than I anticipated,@I see just a sliver of hope.

group_1.textCenter: I have no hope... Even so, I want to believe.
